title: Beef Wellington
steps: Season beef and sear on all sides in hot oil until browned. Cool, then brush with Dijon.
Cook mushrooms, shallots, and garlic in butter until dry and concentrated. Cool completely.
On plastic wrap, lay prosciutto slightly overlapping. Spread mushroom duxelles over prosciutto. Place beef on top and roll tightly. Chill 20 minutes.
Wrap beef/prosciutto in puff pastry, sealing edges. Chill 20 minutes.
Brush with egg yolk. Score pastry lightly. Bake at 400째F (205째C) for 35-45 minutes until pastry is golden and internal temp hits ~125째F (52째C) for medium-rare.
notes: Chilling between steps helps maintain shape; use an instant-read thermometer.
